title: Charter Prices $3 Billion of Junk Bonds Ahead of Cox Deal
description: Charter Communications Inc. sold $3 billion of junk bonds Tuesday as it looks to pay off debt due through 2027 and repurchase equity.
content: Charter Communications Inc. sold $3 billion of junk bonds Tuesday as it looks to pay off debt due through 2027 and repurchase equity.
